content.question: In the figure above, R is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y = 4ln(3 - x), the horizontal line y = 6, and the vertical line x = 2. (a) Find the area of R.

frqParts.text: In the figure above, R is the shaded region in the first quadrant bounded by the graph of y = 4ln(3 - x), the horizontal line y = 6, and the vertical line x = 2. (a) Find the area of R.
(b) Find the volume of the solid generated when R is revolved about the horizontal line y = 8.
(c) The region R is the base of a solid. For this solid, each cross section perpendicular to the x-axis is a square. Find the volume of the solid.

topic.text: 8.4: Finding the Area Between Curves Expressed as Functions of x

skill.text: Skill 2.D: Identify how mathematical characteristics or properties of functions are related in different representations.
